summary:
I am a highly motivated and dynamic, methodical and reflective person, who learns quickly, driven by a great curiosity and is ready to face new challenges.

My aim is to work in a stimulating and constantly evolving environment where I can make the difference, spearheading positive change not only in my workplace but also in the world around me.

projects.title: Ur Story Italia
projects.description:
I'm Founder and Social Media Manager of the Ur Story Italia project.
The project was born with the aim of giving space to the voice of people who have experienced discrimination and racism in Italy. It is a virtual place of sharing, a community to strengthen the awareness that we are not alone, and it also aims to raise awareness/educate those who are poorly informed about the issue.

In fact, the project also consists of collecting and publishing reflections written by readers on various themes, such as colonialism, colourism, micro aggression, the BLM movement from the point of view of an ally, racism in schools, the importance of representation and sense of belonging, the canons of beauty in the black community...

contributors.headline: Junior Data Operations Manager @Reckitt Hygiene HQ | Passionate about Sustainability

projects.title: Industrial Design project
projects.description:
For this university project, my team and I created a microplastic filter for a home appliances company, to install in the new generation of washing machines.

The development of the project was possible after an analysis of the market, an in-depth study of the product engineering (from the design, to the materials used, to the costs related to production) with the subsequent development of the prototype on AutoCAD, and the preparation of a business plan and a pitch to present to the company.

Among different projects, our product has been chosen by the R&D department of the company to be further developed.

projects.title: European debate tournament "Exponi le tue idee!"
projects.description:
The 2020/2021 edition of the debating tournament was part of the European project End Climate Change, Start Climate of Change - in short #ClimateOfChange - of which WeWorld was the leader, involving 16 European organisations, funded by the European Commission under the DEAR (Development Education and Awarareness Raising Programme).

The initiative aimed to stimulate young Europeans in the complex relationship between climate change and migration phenomena, to encourage the creation of a movement of informed people, ready to change their lifestyle and demand new development policies.

My role as leader of my team has been challenging but also highly educating, we have worked on the collection of information related to the different topics of the debates, and prepared our motions supported by data.

The topics of the debates have been:
Opposition side: "We should not abandon policies of "mitigation" of climate change in favour of policies and strategies of "adaptation" to climate change". 

Proposition side: "Prevention and education are enough to spread civic sense, there is no need to focus on combating misconduct".
Opposition side: "Prevention and education are not enough to spread a sense of civic responsibility, it is not necessary to focus on combating misbehaviour".

Proposition side: "The acquisition of large expanses of land in middle and low income countries by companies in high income countries is a positive fact because it exports technological innovation and creates jobs".
Opposition side: "The acquisition of large expanses of land in middle and low income countries by companies in high-income countries is not positive because it favours exploitation and new phenomena of colonization".

projects.title: International Asian Study Program
projects.description:
I worked on a research paper to analyse the waste management system in Hong Kong, Taiwan and Italy.
The focus of the analysis was to highlight the plant feasibility of the machinery used for waste disposal. 

By comparing the results, it was possible to highlight areas for improvement in order to propose investments to increase the capacity of waste disposal plants.

contributors.headline: Junior Data Operations Manager @Reckitt Hygiene HQ | Passionate about Sustainability

projects.title: PRIME project - Business Digitalization
projects.description:
Selected delegated member of ‘Professional Inter-university Management for Educational Networking’ (PRIME) for 2018 International Euroweek Conference, designed to foster leading universities in the promotion of industry-linked education.

The project "Are digital companies more sustainable inside and out?" mainly focuses on business digitalization and social sustainability; it is a compared study among three different European countries (Italy, Spain and Portugal), which underlines both advantages and disadvantages in traditional and digital companies.

I worked in a multicultural team from different European countries, using different digital platforms for research, analysis and writing the paper. We were invited at FH JOANNEUM - International Management University in Kapfenberg (Austria) to present the project in front of students, professors and managers.

projects.title: Innovative solutions for Bricocenter - IXL Center Innovation Olympics
projects.description:
The Innovation Olympics is the World's Largest Innovation Consulting Competition, unique and practical program that challenges business school students and alumni to integrate their business knowledge to solve a real innovation & growth issue for a senior executive from a company.

The consulting project aimed to innovate and digitalise the Bricocenter shop, in collaboration with IXL Innovation Center of Boston.

Thanks to this project I had the opportunity to approach the world of consultancy and discover a strong attitude for client relations, I learned some of the techniques of consultancy to meet the demands of top management such as:
- strategic innovation focus,
- opportunity maps,
- fields of play,
- business concepts,
- implementation map.

Finally, I have worked in a team with a different academic background from mine, allowing the team to have cross-functional skills, and learning how to use our skills to work towards a common goal and deliver an efficient and effective result.

profile_positions.description:
My role as a Junior Digital Technology Consultant involves working with SAP management software and developing back-end programs using the ABAP programming language.

I work in a team that carries projects oriented in different sectors on a wide range of industrial issues; currently we are dealing with a project of conversion from SAP ECC to SAP S/4 HANA for an outstanding italian company.
profile_positions.title: SAP Consultant
Shift Manager Delivery Operations

profile_positions.company: ARS ambiente Srl - Analysis Research and Services for the environment
profile_positions.description:
Internship undertaken during my MSc.

The main purpose of the internship has been to do an in-depth analysis of the issues of waste reduction and food waste as part of the revision of the PRGR - Regional Waste Management Programme - of the Lombardy Region undergoing revision pursuant to the EU Directives on the Circular Economy.

Accomplishments:
- I wrote a proposal for the Region of Lombardy to improve the current management of urban waste and to reduce food waste on the territory.
- I wrote my MSc thesis with the title "The prevention of waste and food waste in regional planning: the case of the Lombardy region" with a focus on the principles of Circular Economy applied on the regional, national and European planning.

Note:
By working remotely during lockdown, I was able to improve my organisational skills such as managing time and work-related complexities, implementing my autonomy and how to interface with colleagues through technology, and improving my problem solving skills.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Consultant

volunteer_experiences.description:
I am leading a team of volunteers to develop a crowdfunding project on the Ginger.com platform to promote the project "Prendiamoci cura di chi non può curarsi" (Let's take care of those who cannot care for themselves), created by the voluntary association Cittadini Ovunque.

The aim of the project is to fight health poverty, which is why a health orientation desk has been opened, offering a medical orientation service and accompaniment to the services provided by the National Health Service.

I have worked as a volunteer in two schools (primary and secondary) in Hong Kong  to:
- Teach English to children,
- Organise cultural exchange activities,
- Organise creative play activities and workshops.
I have worked and lived with a family in Australia as an au pair, taking care of 3 children.
Volunteer at the hospital's paediatric ward, creation of educational and artistic workshops for children and families.

I guided groups through the city of Varese and showed and told them the stories of the historical sites (villas, monuments, churches).
Moreover, I was in charge of marketing and promotion of the association during the FAI spring days.
I have worked as a volunteer at the Caritas soup kitchen.
